survey_name: Hybrid Event Platform User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of hybrid event platforms to assess satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and improve future event experiences.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you overall with the hybrid event platform you used?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you overall with the hybrid event platform you used?

questions.question_text: Which features of the hybrid event platform did you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all used features. Consider adding an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: Which features of the hybrid event platform did you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was your primary reason for attending the hybrid event?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was your primary reason for attending the hybrid event?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of navigation on the hybrid event platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure usability.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of navigation on the hybrid event platform?

questions.question_text: Were you able to effectively network with other attendees during the event?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Virtual networking' in Q2
questions.client_notes: This question should only appear to those who used the networking feature.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Add routing logic based on Q2 selection.

script.question_text: Were you able to effectively network with other attendees during the event?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Virtual networking' in Q2

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face while using the hybrid event platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges did you face while using the hybrid event platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend another hybrid event on this platform in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure future intent.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend another hybrid event on this platform in the future?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the hybrid event platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text with character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the hybrid event platform?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the content presented during the event?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess content quality.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the content presented during the event?

questions.question_text: Did you experience any technical difficulties during the event?
questions.client_notes: Include follow-up question (Q11) if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Add routing logic for Q11.

script.question_text: Did you experience any technical difficulties during the event?

questions.question_text: Please describe the technical difficulties you encountered.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally' in Q10
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather specific technical issues. Limit response length to 300 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text with character limit. Display only if Q10 response is 'Yes'.

script.question_text: Please describe the technical difficulties you encountered.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally' in Q10

questions.question_text: How engaging did you find the hybrid event compared to in-person events?
questions.client_notes: Use this question to compare engagement levels between hybrid and in-person events.

script.question_text: How engaging did you find the hybrid event compared to in-person events?

questions.question_text: Which platform did you use to attend the hybrid event?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for unspecified devices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which platform did you use to attend the hybrid event?
